sources.title: Life at Stake
sources.description: Title: Life at Stake Summary: Directed by: Montgomery Tully Actors: Lee Patterson, Hy Hazell, Colin Gordon Production Company: Insignia Films Release Date: June 1957 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.75: 1 Add Full Plot

metadata.Plot: Attempting to reconstruct a criminal case, a radio presenter seeks the whereabouts of a robber who has recently finished a prison sentence, leading him into danger.
metadata.Actors: Lee Patterson, Paula Byrne, Colin Gordon
